scripts.release:tag: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const v=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json','utf8')).version; require('child_process').execSync('git tag -a v'+v+' -m \"Release v'+v+'\" && git push origin v'+v, {stdio: 'inherit'});"
scripts.release:prepare: pnpm changelog && echo 'Run release:tag to push tag'
